title.en: Public interest disclosure notification online submission tool

html.en:
This online submission tool is to help institutions submit notifications to our office.

Please note that institutions should minimize the amount of personal information to what is necessary to answer the question. Where there is an open field, please consider how to best respond without providing more information than is required.

The information, including personal information, is being collected by our office pursuant to s 8(5) of the Privacy Act, or s 37(2) of the Department of Employment and Social Development Act (DESDA).

For more information about how the OPC manages personal information, please see our Privacy Policy

Public interest disclosure notification online submission tool - Question 1.1
Has this notification been formally approved in accordance with your institution’s approval process?

description.en: 8(5) and 37(2) notifications must be approved by a delegated official. If you are unsure if you should submit a notification, please contact your institution’s Access to Information and Privacy (ATIP) coordinator. You can find their contact information here: https://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/ap/atip-aiprp/coord-eng.asp

html.en: Please ensure that your institution’s approval process has been completed before providing notification to our office. If you are unsure of who this is, please contact your institution’s Access to Information and Privacy (ATIP) Coordinator. You can find their contact information here: https://www.tbs-sct.gc.ca/ap/atip-aiprp/coord-eng.asp
Please provide the name and position title of the official responsible for approving this notification at your institution.

title.en: Public interest disclosure notification online submission tool - Question 5.0
Is the institution disclosing the personal information of one individual, or multiple individuals?

description.en: The OPC asks institutions to provide the name of the affected individual(s) in the case our office determines it is necessary to inform the individual(s) of the disclosure, as per s 8(5) of the Privacy Act. The answer will also effect the structure of the questions that follow.
